title: Forgot my Thunderbird Email Password
content: My Thunderbird Email was on auto password sign in when I would boot up, a couple of days while in start up mode on my computer my area had a blackout. When the power supply returned my Thunderbird Email would not start up and requested my password which I have forgot as it is a while since I last used it. Could someone please advise how do I reset my password in Thunderbird... Thank You Derek
creator: Derek_J_Wilson

title: Transfer to new replacement pc
content:
I have installed T'bird in a new replacement pc and also added my two accounts. However, I now need to include my many Local Folders using Profile Folder information from the old pc.

Should I delete all the account information I have installed in my new pc T'bird prior to installing the Profile Folder copy? Thanks Ron
creator: RonSH

title: Multiple Gmail accounts on Tbird.
content: I have had two Gmail accounts on Tbird for about a year with no problems. Now I get unpredictable or no results trying to send or receive messages from the newer account. A message mentioning unsuccessful server authentification is the most common. "we have sent your message but not mentioned it in the "sent" folder due to connectivity problems" also occurs. I have absolutely no problem on iOS mail or Tbird running on MacOS. To the extent that I can decipher the iOS settings, there is no difference.
creator: chbrownie18

title: Probleem met e-mail
content: De ontvangen e-mails worden niet meer getoont. Wanneer ik een e-mail probeer te openen word een melding getoont: "--clo2zR1lEo0i=_?:--" in plaats van de inhoud van de mail. Erg lastig, e-mail is een levensader voor mij. Kuntr U helpen? Bij voorbaat dank. Bert Michels.

title: issues with whom messages are "from"
content:
Suddenly many messages to me from all sorts of different senders are coming up as being sent by me to me.. If I reply it is working to the correct email. This is getting worse rather than better...... We are using "MAC Book"

We cannot understand why this is suddenly happening.

Karen Philippson Pollock
creator: kop3

title: Thunderbird will not connect to Outlook mail after upgrading security OAuth
content:
Hi all, Microsoft required upgrading Outlook mail account to 2step authentication from normal password. I followed all the instructions after that to connect Thunderbird, both 1) Server setting and 2) Outgoing Server SMTP here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

Since I did, Thunderbird will no longer connect and retrieve mail. It just hangs.

Is there a conflict as I am still using a POP Outlook account? Meaning do I need an IMAP setup? I'm really, really tech illiterate, so dumb it right down for me, please.
creator: davidblahut

title: Blank screen after delete message
content:
When i delete any message, TB get unresponsive. It couldn't show any other messages but shows blank screen when try any folder. All folders become clear with no any message inside.

I should restart the TB to be able to access again the folders and messages.

Can anyone support to fix ? or what could be the reason for this issue ?

title: Jio-fiber-cancellation-customer -
content: To cancel your Jio AirFiber request, you typically need to contact Jio customer support either through their hotline O8252-3O1-6OO or online chat service. They will guide you through the cancellation process and may require some information from you to proceed with the cancellation.
creator: a815230a

title: poczta thunderbird nie pobiera poczty z wp
content:
Na komputerze mam zainstalowany wiele lat thunderbird , który jest skonfigurowany z pocztą wp. Cały czas było wszystko dobrze od 30 września zaczął się problem z pobieraniem poczty z wp natomiast wiadomości wysyła . Rozumiem tak to że ma problem z pop3. Komunikat jaki wyskakuje to

Logowanie na serwerze pop3.wp.pl za pomocą nazwy użytkownika angela608 się nie powiodło.

Cały czas było dobrze i nagle bez powodu wyskakuje taki problem. Proszę o pomoc w rozwiązaniu awarii
creator: aaaaangelllll40
